Name: Akuya
About the game: Have you played enough serious games? Do you want to relax and have some fun with your friends? Well, maybe you can laugh on your own, it is only your decision. 'Akuya' is not a normal game. It's actually weird to call it a game. IT'S NOT A GAME! Are you here to buy a 'NO-GAME'? If you are, then go on! Try it! Be the person who tries desperatly to survive on an island in the middle of the ocean. Is it possible to survive? Of course not! After all we want to be realistic! Have fun!
